item.title: ðŸŸ¢ Apple School Manager: Outage (resolved)
item.description:
Started: 06/23/2025 23:54 PDT
Ended: 06/24/2025 01:58 PDT
The service may have been unavailable or slow for some users.
Some users were affected
Affected Services: Apple Business Essentials, Apple Business Manager, Apple School Manager
